Package game.suite

This package contains all the necessary classes to run Game Suite.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AchievementsViewController
    controller class for the achievementsLaunch.fxml file gives information such as the achievements, name, game and descriptions to achievementsLaunch to display them in the GUI.
    CheckersBoard
    Represents a game board for a Checkers Game.
    CheckersGame
    Game class to setup a complete Checkers Game.
    CheckersGameDisplay
    The game display class which is a subclass of JPanel.
    CheckersKing
    Represents a King piece in Checkers.
    CheckersKingTest
    Test cases for the King Piece.
    CheckersMoveCommand
    Represents a command issued in Checkers.
    CheckersPawn
    Class that represents a normal Checkers piece that is not a king.
    CheckersPawnTest
    Test cases for the Pawn.
    CheckersPiece
    Defines what a Checkers piece should be.
    CheckersPieceTest
    General tests for all Pieces.
    CheckersPlayer
    Class representing a Checkers Player.
    CheckersSquare
    This class represents a square on the Checkers board.
    CheckersStandardBoard
    Subclass of a board.
    ChessBishop
    Subclass of a Piece specific to a Bishop.
    ChessBishopTest
    Tests for the Bishop Piece.
    ChessBoard
    Superclass Board defines a standard board.
    ChessGame  
    ChessGameDisplay
    The game display class which is a subclass of JPanel.
    ChessKing
    Subclass of a Piece specific to a King.
    ChessKingTest
    Test cases for the King.
    ChessKnight
    Subclass of a Piece specific to a Knight.
    ChessKnightTest
    Test cases for the Knight.
    ChessMoveCommand
    chessMoveCommand class to store the moves by Players.
    ChessPawn
    Subclass of a Piece specific to a Pawn.
    ChessPawnTest
    Test cases for the Pawn.
    ChessPiece
    Superclass Chess pieces have common variables and methods to execute.
    ChessPieceTest
    General tests for all Pieces.
    ChessPlayer
    Class representing a Chess Player.
    ChessQueen
    Subclass of a Piece specific to a Queen.
    ChessQueenTest
    Test cases for the Queen.
    ChessRook
    Subclass of a Piece specific to a Rook.
    ChessRookTest
    Test cases for the Rook.
    ChessSquare
    This class represents a square on the chess board.
    ChessStandardBoard
    Subclass of a board.
    ConnectFourBoard
    This class holds a 2d array of Integers that represent the game board.
    ConnectFourBoardTest
    Class for testing the connect 4 board.
    ConnectFourEngine
    Contains all the game logic for Connect Four.
    ConnectFourEngineTest
    Class to test connect four engine.
    ConnectFourViewController
    This class controls the UI for Connect Four.
    Main
    Main class for Game Suite.
    MainMenuViewController
    Controller class for the main menu.
    TicTacToe
    Class to create Tic Tac Toe game engine.
    TicTacToeBoardPane
    Class to display the Tic Tac Toe game board.
    TicTacToeCellPane
    Class to display a cell in the Tic Tac Toe board.
    TicTacToeFXGUI
    Class to create the Tic Tac Toe GUI.
    TicTacToeObservable
    Class to turn the TicTacToeFXGUI into an observable class.
    TicTacToeTest
    Class to test TicTacToe.

    Enum Description

    Enums for achievement in each game.
    CheckersBoard.Color
    Represents Color values of black or white pieces and squares.
    ChessBoard.Color
    Enum for Color values of black or white pieces and squares.

Package game.suite Description

This package contains all the necessary classes to run Game Suite. Chess and Checkers are implemented using Swing, while Connect Four, Tic Tac Toe, and the Main Menu are implemented using JavaFX. It also contains the FXML files for the games implemented in JavaFX, as well as the controller for the Achievements screen.
